channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music

item.title: CVE-2019-10520|2024-08-04T22:24:18.605Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20voice%20%26%20music
item.description: An unprivileged application can allocate GPU memory by calling memory allocation ioctl function and can exhaust all the memory which results in out of memory in Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music in QCS405, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 665, SD 675, SD 712 / SD 710 / SD 670, SD 730, SD 845 / SD 850, SD 855
